1207.question: What language technologies have been introduced in the past?
1207.response: {'Answer': 'Various language technologies that have been introduced in the past include Font & Keyboard, Speech-to-Text, Text-to-Speech, Text Prediction, Spell Checker, Grammar Checker, Text Search, Machine Translation, Voice to Text Search, and Voice to Speech Search. The availability and quality of these technologies vary based on the resource status of a language, with some technologies having excellent quality (indicated by three stars) for highly resourced languages, while others are still rudimentary (indicated by one star) for less-resourced languages. Additionally, the requirement for data and linguistic expertise varies, with some technologies requiring a very high
1207.answer:
- Font & Keyboard
- Speech-to-Text
- Text-to-Speech
- Text Prediction
- Spell Checker
- Grammar Checker
- Text Search
- Machine Translation
- Voice to Text Search
- Voice to Speech Search
